ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I feel that my elderly relative is (will be) an overly demanding person to care for.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that caring for my elderly relative puts (will put) a strain on family relationships.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that caring for my elderly relative disrupts (will disrupt) my routine in my home.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that caring for my elderly relative interferes (will interfere) with my friends or friends of my family coming to my home.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that caring for my elderly relative has negatively affected (will negatively affect) my family's or my physical health.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that caring for my elderly relative has negatively affected (will negatively affect) my appetite.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that caring for my elderly relative has caused me (will cause me) to be physically fatigued.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that caring for my elderly relative has caused me (will cause me) to become anxious.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that meeting the psychological needs of my elderly relative for feeling wanted and important is not (will not be) worth the effort)
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that meeting the health needs of my elderly relative is not (will not be) worth the effort.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that meeting the daily needs of my elderly relative is not (will not be) worth the effort.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that meeting the social needs of my elderly relative for companionship is not (will not be) worth the effort.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that my elderly relative is (will be) an overly demanding person to care for.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that my elderly relative tries (will try) to manipulate me.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that caring for my elderly relative has caused (will cause) my family and me much aggravation.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that my elderly relative makes (will make) unnecessary requests of me for care.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that caring for my elderly relative is causing me (will cause me) to dip into savings meant for other things.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that my family and I must give up (will have to give up) necessities because of the expense to care for my elderly relative.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that my family and I cannot (will not be able to) afford those little extras because of the expense to care for my elderly relative.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: I feel that caring for my elderly relative is (will be) too expensive.
Notes: 1= Strongly agree; 2= Agree; 3= Disagree; 4= Strongly disagree; 99= Missing

ElementDescription: Cost of Care Index - Total Cost
Notes: 20= Low cost; 100= High cost

ElementDescription: Cost of Care Index - Personal and Social Restrictions Subscore
Notes: Sum of items coci_01-04

ElementDescription: Cost of Care Index - Physical and Emotional Health Subscore
Notes: Sum of items coci_05-08

ElementDescription: Cost of Care Index - Value Subscore
Notes: Sum of items coci_09-12

ElementDescription: Cost of Care Index - Care Recipient as Provocateur Subscore
Notes: Sum of items coci_13-16

ElementDescription: Cost of Care Index - Economic Costs Subscore
Notes: Sum of items coci_17-20

ElementDescription: I feel that my relative (with dementia, whom you care for) is an overly demanding person to care for.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Neither disagree/agree; 4=Agree; 5=Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel that my relative (with dementia, whom you care for) tries to manipulate me.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Neither disagree/agree; 4=Agree; 5=Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel that my relative (with dementia, whom you care for) has caused my family and me much aggravation.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Neither disagree/agree; 4=Agree; 5=Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel that my relative (with dementia, whom you care for) makes unnecessary requests of me for care.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Neither disagree/agree; 4=Agree; 5=Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel that my relative (with dementia, whom you care for) has more control over their symptoms than they pretend.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Neither disagree/agree; 4=Agree; 5=Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel that my relative (with dementia, whom you care for) uses their disease to gain sympathy and get away with bad behaviors.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Neither disagree/agree; 4=Agree; 5=Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel that my relative (with dementia, whom you care for) purposefully is on their ''best behavior'' when others are around.
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree; 2=Disagree; 3=Neither disagree/agree; 4=Agree; 5=Strongly agree
